Sets the width and height of the object.
setDimensions(Dimension) - Method in class gametools.Game
Sets both the width and height of the game.
Note: This function will not work after the create function is executed.

setRelationalMovement(boolean) - Method in class gametools.Sprite
Turns on or off relational movement, where a sprite's directions are relational to where it is facing (its angle).
setRemoveArea(Area) - Method in class gametools.Group
Defines the area the sprites can move inside.
setRepeatAmount(int) - Method in class gametools.Animation
 
setRotationSpeed(double) - Method in class gametools.Sprite
Sets the speed the sprite will rotate at.
setSpeed(int) - Method in class gametools.Animation
Sets how many frames it will take for the animation to move to the next image.
setSpeed(double) - Method in class gametools.Sprite
Sets the speed the sprite will move at when using its move methods.
setTitle(String) - Method in class gametools.Game
Sets the title to display at the top of the game window.
setup() - Method in class gametools.Game
Method that runs only once for initializing objects and running setup code.
setVolume(float) - Method in class gametools.Sound
Sets the relative volume of the sound, where zero is the default volume, negative numbers mean quieter and positive numbers mean louder than the default.

Scales the animation to match the new width.

size() - Method in class gametools.Group
 
Sound - Class in gametools
An easy to use class for sound playback that wraps the java clip class.
Sound(String) - Constructor for class gametools.Sound
Creates a sound and opens the file at the passed in path.
Note: This class only has support for certain encodings of wav files.
Sprite - Class in gametools
Used for adding movement and behavior for graphics.
Sprite() - Constructor for class gametools.Sprite
Creates a blank sprite without an image or position.
Sprite(BufferedImage) - Constructor for class gametools.Sprite
Creates a sprite in the default location (the corner of the screen) with a custom image.
Sprite(Animation) - Constructor for class gametools.Sprite
Creates a sprite in the default location (the corner of the screen) with a custom animation.
Sprite(Graphic) - Constructor for class gametools.Sprite
Creates a sprite and copies over all the properties from the graphic.
Sprite(Position, Animation) - Constructor for class gametools.Sprite
Creates a sprite at the specified coordinates with a custom animation.
Sprite(Sprite) - Constructor for class gametools.Sprite
Creates an exact copy of the passed in sprite.
Sprite.Direction - Enum in gametools
The predefined directions the sprite can move in.
Sprite.Rotation - Enum in gametools
The directions in which the sprite can rotate.
stopConstantlyMoving() - Method in class gametools.Sprite
Disables the sprite from moving constantly if it was set to do so in a different method.
